Getting And Cleaning Data - Course Project Codebook

Data is collected from 30 different volunteers, indicated by number.  Data listed is only mean and std deviation measures from selected variables.  

#Naming Conventions for variables

##Prefix
Time - timeseries based data (collected at 50hz)
Freq - Frequency based data (using Fourier transformation)

##Axis info
X, Y, X indicate the direction that the sensors are tracking against

##Sensor Type
Acc - Accelerometer
gyro - gyroscope

##measure
mean - arithmatic mean
std - standard deviation
